com.amazon.ags.api.whispersync
Class WhispersyncEventListener

java.lang.Object
  com.amazon.ags.api.whispersync.WhispersyncEventListener

public class WhispersyncEventListener
extends java.lang.Object

This event listener can be used to provide feedback to the player, but is mostly intended to increase visibility of various events during debugging. All methods are empty, so you only need to override the methods you are interested in. See WhispersyncClient.setWhispersyncEventListener()

Constructor Summary
WhispersyncEventListener()
           
 
Method Summary
 void onDataUploadedToCloud()
          This event will occur when game data has successfully been uploaded to the cloud.
 void onDiskWriteComplete()
          This event will occur when game data has been written to the local file system.
 void onFirstSynchronize()
          This event will occur the very first time the game successfully attempts to download game data from the cloud, regardless of whether game data existed in or not.
 void onNewCloudData()
          This event will occur when game data is downloaded after installation, or when another device registered to the player has uploaded new game data.
 void onThrottled()
          This event will occur when a cloud synchronization attempt is made too soon after a previous synchronization.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

WhispersyncEventListener

public WhispersyncEventListener()
Method Detail

onNewCloudData

public void onNewCloudData()
This event will occur when game data is downloaded after installation, or when another device registered to the player has uploaded new game data.

onDataUploadedToCloud

public void onDataUploadedToCloud()
This event will occur when game data has successfully been uploaded to the cloud.

onThrottled

public void onThrottled()
This event will occur when a cloud synchronization attempt is made too soon after a previous synchronization.

onDiskWriteComplete

public void onDiskWriteComplete()
This event will occur when game data has been written to the local file system.

onFirstSynchronize

public void onFirstSynchronize()
This event will occur the very first time the game successfully attempts to download game data from the cloud, regardless of whether game data existed in or not. This may be useful for triggering the v1 migration process.
